tool_description: Anonymizes or pseudonymizes customer data while preserving analytical value, ensuring irreversible privacy protection for data sharing or retention.

customer_data.description: JSON string of customer data to anonymize

anonymization_level.description: Level of anonymization: pseudonymization, k_anonymity, differential_privacy, or full_anonymization

preserve_fields.description: Fields to preserve for analytical purposes

k_value.description: K-anonymity parameter when using k_anonymity method

error_messages: Invalid customer_data format: Provide properly formatted JSON string of customer data.
Invalid anonymization_level: Use one of [pseudonymization, k_anonymity, differential_privacy, full_anonymization].
Invalid preserve_fields: Specified fields do not exist in the customer data.
Invalid k_value: K-anonymity parameter must be an integer between 2 and 100.
Anonymization failed: Unable to apply requested anonymization method to provided data.
usage: Provide customer_data as JSON and specify anonymization_level. Optionally preserve specific fields and set k_value for k-anonymity method.

anonymized_data.description: JSON string of anonymized customer data

fields_modified.description: List of fields that were anonymized

privacy_level_achieved.description: Level of privacy protection achieved: low, medium, high, or maximum
